title: icons
body: just curious, can any riot member check to see if the "LITTLE DEVIL TEEMO ICON" is unlocked on my account and if it matters which of the doom bots mode we played on in order to get the icon?

replies.body: I do see you have the Doomed Minion Icon, but it may take up to [2 weeks after November 3rd](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016) to receive the icon.  The game time for doom bots shouldn't matter, so you'll be fine.  It's going to take some time, so hang out until it's rolled out to everyone!
